Reviews.Title: My Canon 3ti
Reviews.Author: Kathya
Reviews.Content: Buy this camera has been my best investment, it comes with everything that has, by the way .... I have taken the photos are beautiful, amazing, just .... I love amazon

Reviews.Title: That was exactly what I expected, the set is quite satisfying, probably the bag could be better
Reviews.Author: Alexander I Egorov
Reviews.Content: That was exactly what I expected, the set is quite satisfying, probably the bag could be better. I might need additional lens though

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: Matt Honeycutt
Reviews.Content: I am very, very pleased with all of the items that came in this package so far.  The only glitch was that Hurricane Sandy caused UPS to be backed up and it took 12 days for me to receive my order.  This is a great deal and I am so glad I bought it!

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: Ven
Reviews.Content: The product came as described. The shipment was quick. Received in 2 days (regular shipping). It was a nice deal when I bought (though the price fell by $50 later on). Except for the bag (looks like a picnic lunch bag) all ites were great.

Reviews.Title: It's Simple.
Reviews.Author: GeeRoger
Reviews.Content: I like simple. Sure, I could talk about the bright pictures of the grandkids.I could talk about the utility of x10 focus when copying artwork.But I'd rather talk about what wasn't.- No pressure upsell. I can't add to the New York/New Jersey horror stories.- No calls about missing items. All items arrived as advertised.- No call to FedEx/UPS.  Big Value shipped promptly.- No buyers remorse about paying too much. Competitive pricing.All-in-all, it's a nice camera, not too complicated. Simple.

ProductInfo.Features:
18.0 MP CMOS sensor and DIGIC 4 Image Processor for high image quality and speed.
ISO 100 - 6400 for shooting from bright to dim light.
Improved EOS Full HD Movie mode with manual exposure control, expanded recording with new Movie Digital zoom
3.0-inch Vari-Angle Clear View LCD; Built-in flash; Full HD movie mode at 1920 x 1080 resolution
Compatible with full line of Canon EF and EF-S lenses
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera and DIGIC 4 Imaging with EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS Lens + 32GB Memory+ Extra Battery/Charger + 3 Piece Filter Kit + Full Size Tripod + Case +Accessory Kit
